mojo.description: Mojo for building a data image

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Display help information on docker-maven-plugin. Call mvn docker:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name> to display parameter details.

parameter.name: detail
parameter.description: If true, display all settable properties for each goal.

parameter.name: goal
parameter.description: The name of the goal for which to show help. If unspecified, all goals will be displayed.

parameter.name: indentSize
parameter.description: The number of spaces per indentation level, should be positive.

parameter.name: lineLength
parameter.description: The maximum length of a display line, should be positive.

mojo.description: Mojo for printing logs of a container. By default the logs of all containers are shown interwoven with the time occured. The log output can be highly customized in the plugin configuration, please refer to the reference manual for documentation. This Mojo is intended for standalone usage. See StartMojo for how to enabling logging when starting containers.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Goal for pushing a data-docker container

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Mojo for removing images. By default only data images are removed. Data images are images without a run configuration. By setting removeAll (property: docker.removeAll) also other images can be removed. In order to explicitly restrict the images to remove, use images to specify a (comma separated) list of images to remove.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

parameter.name: autoCreateCustomNetworks
parameter.description: Whether to create the customs networks (user-defined bridge networks) before starting automatically

parameter.name: containerNamePattern
parameter.description: Naming pattern for how to name containers when started

parameter.name: exposeContainerProps
parameter.description: Expose container information like the internal IP as Maven properties which can be reused in the build information. The value of this property is the prefix used for the properties. The default prefix is 'docker.container'. Only information of images having an alias are exposed and have the format <prefix>.<alias>.<property>. (e.g. docker.container.mycontainer.ip The following properties are currently supported: - ip : the container's internal IP address as chosen by Docker If set to an empty string, no properties are exposed.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Mojo for attaching one more source docker tar file to an artifact. If used in a lifecycle called 'docker-tar' the artifacts are attached without classifier. Otherwise the classifier is 'docker' and, depending on the selected BuildImageSelectMode, the alias name of the build configuration.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

parameter.name: sourceMode
parameter.description: Mode how to attach the source artifact: - first : The first image with build configuration - all : All images with build configuration. Each image must have an alias configured which is use as part of the classifier.

mojo.description: Goal for creating and starting a docker container. This goal evaluates the image configuration

parameter.name: autoCreateCustomNetworks
parameter.description: Whether to create the customs networks (user-defined bridge networks) before starting automatically

parameter.name: containerNamePattern
parameter.description: Naming pattern for how to name containers when started

parameter.name: exposeContainerProps
parameter.description: Expose container information like the internal IP as Maven properties which can be reused in the build information. The value of this property is the prefix used for the properties. The default prefix is 'docker.container'. Only information of images having an alias are exposed and have the format <prefix>.<alias>.<property>. (e.g. docker.container.mycontainer.ip The following properties are currently supported: - ip : the container's internal IP address as chosen by Docker If set to an empty string, no properties are exposed.

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Mojo for stopping containers. If called together with docker:start (i.e. when configured for integration testing in a lifefcycle phase), then only the container started by this goal will be stopped and removed by default (this can be tuned with the system property docker.keepContainer). If this goal is called standalone, then all containers are stopped, for which images has been configured in the pom.xml

parameter.name: autoCreateCustomNetworks
parameter.description: Whether to create the customs networks (user-defined bridge networks) before starting automatically

parameter.name: containerNamePattern
parameter.description: Naming pattern for how to name containers when started

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Mojo to remove volumes created with VolumeCreateMojo

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely

mojo.description: Mojo for watching source code changes. This Mojo does essentially two things when it detects a image content change: - Rebuilding one or more images - Restarting restarting one or more containers

parameter.name: autoCreateCustomNetworks
parameter.description: Whether to create the customs networks (user-defined bridge networks) before starting automatically

parameter.name: containerNamePattern
parameter.description: Naming pattern for how to name containers when started

parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: Whether to restrict operation to a single image. This can be either the image or an alias name. It can also be comma separated list. This parameter has to be set via the command line s system property.

parameter.name: skipMachine
parameter.description: Whether the usage of docker machine should be skipped competely
